summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of the AST feature extraction component, covering basic operation, handling of double‑precision padding, saving and loading of pretrained extractors, JSON serialization of extracted features, and overall integration within the processing pipeline.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the abstract syntax tree feature extraction module for reliable use in code analysis and machine‑learning workflows, ensuring that models can be persisted, exported, and integrated without errors.
